import { Component, Inject } from '@angular/core'; import { MAT_DIALOG_DATA } from '@angular/material/dialog'; @Component({ selector: 'app-purchase-summary-dialog', templateUrl: 'purchase-summary-dialog.component.html', }) export class PurchaseSummaryDialogComponent { constructor(@Inject(MAT_DIALOG_DATA) public data: any) {} }
